com.boomi.connector.workdayprism.model

Class AuthProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.boomi.connector.workdayprism.model.AuthProvider

  • public class AuthProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible of getting a new Access Token from the Workday Prism API and store it into connector cache before returning its String representation upon a call to getAccessToken(boolean). The TTL of the provided token is not documented by Workday and therefore this class will return the same token until its renewal is forcing by passing true value to the forceRefresh parameter of the aforementioned method.
    Author:
    Gaston Cruz

    • Method Detail

      • getBasePath

        public java.lang.String getBasePath(java.lang.String urlPattern)
        Returns a full url context including protocol, host and base path.
        Parameters:
        urlPattern - a String value with the API path to which the host and tenant id must be appended

      • getAccessToken

        public java.lang.String getAccessToken(boolean forceRefresh)
        Returns an Access Token for the credentials configured in the BrowseContext passed during the construction of this class. The token will be stored in cache until this method is called with a true value to force it renewal.
        Parameters:
        forceRefresh - a boolean value to indicate if the token must be refreshed.
